channel.title: 🚨 Fire22 Dashboard - Critical Error Alerts
channel.description: Real-time critical error notifications for Fire22 Dashboard Worker system requiring immediate attention

item.title: 🚨 CRITICAL: E7001 - Fire22 API Unauthorized - Data Extraction Completely Blocked
item.description:
🚨 URGENT: Fire22 Data Extraction Completely Blocked

Error Code: E7001 - FIRE22_API_UNAUTHORIZED

Severity: CRITICAL

Status: 401 Unauthorized on ALL Fire22 API endpoints

🔴 Immediate Impact:

  • ❌ Customer data sync (2,600+ records) - BLOCKED
  • ❌ Agent hierarchy extraction - BLOCKED
  • ❌ Transaction history retrieval - BLOCKED
  • ❌ Betting data extraction - BLOCKED
  • ❌ Live wager monitoring - BLOCKED

🎯 Required Action:

Security Team: Provide valid Fire22 API authentication credentials immediately

Fire22 Team: Confirm API access permissions and endpoint configuration

📊 Current Status:

  • Infrastructure: 75% ready (waiting for credentials)
  • Data extraction: 0% complete (blocked by authentication)
  • System impact: Complete data flow stoppage

Next Steps: Contact security team immediately for Fire22 API credentials
item.author: system@fire22.ag (Fire22 System Monitor)

item.title: 🚨 CRITICAL: E7002 - Bun.secrets Credential Storage Not Functioning
item.description:
🔐 CRITICAL: Secure Credential Storage System Down

Error Code: E7002 - FIRE22_CREDENTIALS_STORAGE_FAILED

Severity: CRITICAL

Issue: Bun.secrets.get() returning undefined

🔴 System Impact:

  • ❌ Cannot store Fire22 API credentials securely
  • ❌ Cannot retrieve stored authentication tokens
  • ❌ Multi-environment credential management broken
  • ❌ Security compliance at risk

🎯 Required Action:

Infrastructure Team: Verify Bun.secrets and OS credential manager access

Security Team: Validate credential storage policies and permissions

🔧 Possible Causes:

  • OS credential manager (Keychain/libsecret/CredMan) access denied
  • Missing Bun runtime permissions
  • Credential storage service not running

Temporary Workaround: Environment variables (security risk)
item.author: system@fire22.ag (Fire22 System Monitor)

item.title: 🚨 CRITICAL: E7003 - Fire22 Database Not Connected - Local Storage Blocked
item.description:
🗄️ CRITICAL: Local Data Storage System Down

Error Code: E7003 - FIRE22_DATABASE_NOT_CONNECTED

Severity: CRITICAL

Issue: SQLite database connection failed

🔴 Data Storage Impact:

  • ❌ Local Fire22 data storage - BLOCKED
  • ❌ Customer repository operations - FAILED
  • ❌ Agent hierarchy caching - UNAVAILABLE
  • ❌ Transaction logging - DISABLED
  • ❌ Betting data persistence - BLOCKED

🎯 Required Action:

Database Team: Initialize SQLite database connection

Infrastructure Team: Verify database file permissions and disk space

🔧 Immediate Solutions:

  • Run: bun run scripts/verify-fire22-database.ts
  • Check permissions: ls -la dashboard.db
  • Test connection: sqlite3 dashboard.db '.tables'

Database Schema: Ready and waiting for connection
item.author: system@fire22.ag (Fire22 System Monitor)

item.title: ⚠️ ERROR: E7004 - Cloudflare KV Namespaces Missing - Performance Impact
item.description:
⚡ ERROR: Performance Caching System Unavailable

Error Code: E7004 - CLOUDFLARE_KV_NAMESPACES_MISSING

Severity: ERROR (Non-blocking but performance impacting)

Issue: KV namespace IDs not configured in wrangler.toml

🟡 Performance Impact:

  • ⚠️ Fire22 API response caching - DISABLED
  • ⚠️ Authentication token caching - DISABLED
  • ⚠️ Registry package caching - DISABLED
  • ⚠️ Slower API response times (no cache hits)

🎯 Required Action:

DevOps Team: Create and configure Cloudflare KV namespaces

Infrastructure Team: Update wrangler.toml with KV namespace IDs

🔧 Setup Commands:

  • wrangler kv:namespace create fire22-data-cache
  • wrangler kv:namespace create fire22-auth-cache
  • wrangler kv:namespace create fire22-registry-cache

Priority: Medium (system works but slower without caching)
item.author: system@fire22.ag (Fire22 System Monitor)

item.title: 📊 Fire22 Dashboard System Status - Multiple Critical Issues Detected
item.description:
🔍 Current System Readiness Assessment

📈 Overall Readiness Score: 55/100

Status: ❌ NOT READY - Significant issues blocking operations

✅ Infrastructure Ready:

  • ✅ Local SQLite schema (Fire22 tables configured)
  • ✅ Cloudflare D1 databases (multi-environment)
  • ✅ R2 archive storage (7-year retention configured)
  • ✅ DNS optimization (sub-millisecond resolution)
  • ✅ Security architecture (Bun.secrets integration)

❌ Critical Blockers:

  • ❌ E7001: Fire22 API 401 Unauthorized (BLOCKS ALL DATA EXTRACTION)
  • ❌ E7002: Bun.secrets not functioning (BLOCKS SECURE CREDENTIALS)
  • ❌ E7003: Database not connected (BLOCKS LOCAL STORAGE)
  • ⚠️ E7004: KV namespaces missing (IMPACTS PERFORMANCE)

🎯 Immediate Actions Required:

  1. Security Team: Provide Fire22 API credentials (E7001)
  2. Infrastructure Team: Fix Bun.secrets access (E7002)
  3. Database Team: Initialize SQLite connection (E7003)
  4. DevOps Team: Configure KV namespaces (E7004)

Data Extraction Status: 0% complete - Completely blocked by authentication issues

Expected Resolution Time: 2-4 hours with proper credentials
item.author: system@fire22.ag (Fire22 System Monitor)
